name: docxtemplater-link-module-free
description: Open Source Link Module for docxtemplater 3.x

scripts.compile: rimraf js && mkdirp js && babel es6 --out-dir js
scripts.preversion: npm test && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run test:compiled
scripts.browserify: rimraf build && mkdirp build && browserify --insert-global-vars __filename,__dirname -r ./js/index.js -s ImageModule > build/linkmodule.js

author: Eric De Sa
